item.title: Why I Walked Away From Magento After 10 Years
item.description: After over a decade working with Magento, I decided to walk away - not because I couldn’t do it anymore, but because I couldn’t stand why I was doing it anymore.

item.title: Bitcoin - The Ultimate Manifestation of Satyagraha
item.description: In a world where financial systems often prioritize control and centralization, Bitcoin embodies the spirit of Satyagraha - truth-force and nonviolent resistance. Just as Gandhi championed the power of peaceful protest to challenge injustice, Bitcoin empowers individuals to reclaim their financial sovereignty without firing a single shot.
